task.title: Exporting user-defined entities to Triple'A Plus Core

taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have at least one domain model in your project that contains user-defined entities with no validation errors and that your project properties are correctly set to allow to user-defined entities management.

step.cmd: Open your project references and select the line Design Studio Code Generation .
Check the cartridge AAA (domain): UD Entities.
Generate code on one domain model, domain package or whole project.

taskbody.result: An output file is generated in the -gen project in the folder: src/aaa/. This file is a Triple'A Plus Core import command file merging all user-defined entities domain models data to import.
